text: Deva (; ) is the capital city of Hunedoara County, Romania. It is on the left bank of the river Mureș. In 2021, 53,113 people live in Deva. == References == == Other websites == * Deva City Hall – Official website Category:County capitals of Romania Category:Cities in Romania Category:Municipalities of Romania Category:Hunedoara County
title: Deva, Romania
